meanings.definition: Foolhardiest: showing a reckless disregard for danger or consequences
meanings.sent1: He made the foolhardiest decision to jump off the roof without checking if there was a safety net.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the foolhardiest adventurer in the group, always taking unnecessary risks.
meanings.sent3: The foolhardiest squirrel in the park tried to steal a sandwich from a picnic basket guarded by a dog.
meanings.sent4: His foolhardiest attempt to swim across the river during a storm nearly cost him his life.
meanings.sent5: The foolhardiest stuntman in the movie industry performed daring jumps without any safety equipment.

meanings.definition: Foolhardiest: the most foolhardy or reckless person
meanings.sent1: Among all his friends, he was considered the foolhardiest when it came to trying dangerous stunts.
meanings.sent2: She proved to be the foolhardiest of the group by attempting to climb the highest peak without proper gear.
meanings.sent3: The foolhardiest student in the class tried to sneak out of school by crawling through the window during a test.
meanings.sent4: In the world of extreme sports, he was known as the foolhardiest competitor, always pushing the limits.
meanings.sent5: The foolhardiest driver on the road sped through red lights without a care for the consequences.
